testimonials.name: Evangelos Foutzitzis
testimonials.testimonial: Very motivated and efficient developer. Danko completed the requirements very fast and exceeded my expectations. A pleasure to work with! I will definitely hire again.

testimonials.name: Jose da Silva
testimonials.testimonial: Provider was once again a great asset for the project, huge demonstrations of professionalism and a great eye for detail. Even after i informed that i was extremely happy with the outcome he sent a new package with neat detail improvements. Will definitely hire him again.

testimonials.name: Chris Kergin
testimonials.testimonial: Danko did some great front end work with an extremely tight deadline at really busy time. Needless to say, this guy is reliable and delivers a fantastic product. I won't hesitate to work with Danko again in the future.

testimonials.name: Matthew Kretsinger
testimonials.testimonial: Excellent work! I wasn't sure what I wanted was going to be possible, but he did not give up and came through in the end! I will certainly hire again!

testimonials.name: Bryan Ferre
testimonials.testimonial: This was a last minute project. He got right on it and turned it around in less than 24 hours just as I had required. I will definitely work with him again.

testimonials.name: Jose da Silva
testimonials.testimonial: Will definitely work with Danko in the future. Outstanding work and always available.

testimonials.name: Chris Kergin
testimonials.testimonial: Danko continues to over-perform. He's a great developer for any front-end work and simply a great person to work with. I'll certainly work with him again.

testimonials.name: Matthew Kretsinger
testimonials.testimonial: Excellent work! Fast, professional, knowledgeable and detail oriented! Will hire again!
